name: Mauw
description:
• Mouse Controls.
  • Press the button to bet all the energy you have collected from vases.  
  • Collect more blue energy before rolling  to get better towers.
  • Collect more red energy to improve odds of receiving HP.

Art, music, sfx, and programming  by me: Chase of Bass

Created for minijam 80 - Theme:  Cats - Limitation: 8x8 pixel art
